string-array.name: interrupt_filter_sync_to_watch_steps
string-array.item: On your computer, make sure you have access to ADB. If you don\'t, you\'ll need to install ADB from https://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2317790

Enable ADB on your watch. This can be done by navigating to Settings -> System -> About, then tapping \'Build number\' until developer mode is enabled. Then, from Settings, navigate to \'Developer Options\'. Scroll down and enable \'ADB Debugging\'. If your watch doesn\'t support USB data transfer, you\'ll need to enable \'Debug over Wi-Fi\' as well
Connect your watch to your computer, either by USB (if your watch supports it) or via Wi-Fi (You\'ll need to run \'adb connect\' followed by your watch IP address)

Run the following command: adb shell settings put secure enabled_notification_listeners com.google.android.wearable.app/com.google.android.clockwork.stream.NotificationCollectorService:com.boswelja.devicemanager/com.boswelja.devicemanager.service.InterruptFilterLocalChangeListener
